verses.text: Be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me: for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w trusteth|strong="H2620"\w* in thee: yea, in the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of thy \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* will I make my \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w*, until \add these\add* \w calamities|strong="H1942"\w* be \w overpast|strong="H5674"\w*.\f + \fr 57.1 \ft Al-taschith: or, Destroy not\f*\f + \fr 57.1 \ft Michtam: or, A golden Psalm\f*
I will \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* most \w high|strong="H5945"\w*; unto \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w performeth|strong="H1584"\w* \add all things\add* for me.

He shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me \add from\add* the \w reproach|strong="H2778"\w* of him that would swallow me \w up|strong="H7602"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*. \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall send \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and his \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.\f + \fr 57.3 \ft from theâ€¦: or, he reproacheth him that\f*

My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add is\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w lions|strong="H3833"\w*: \add and\add* I \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \add even among\add* them that are set on \w fire|strong="H3857"\w*, \add even\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, whose \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \add are\add* \w spears|strong="H2595"\w* and \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*, and their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* a \w sharp|strong="H2299"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Be thou \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, above the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; \add let\add* thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \add be\add* above all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

They have \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* a \w net|strong="H7568"\w* for my \w steps|strong="H6471"\w*; my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is bowed \w down|strong="H3721"\w*: they have \w digged|strong="H3738"\w* a \w pit|strong="H7882"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* whereof they are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \add themselves\add*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*: I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* and give \w praise|strong="H2167"\w*.\f + \fr 57.7 \ft fixed: or, prepared\f*

Awake \w up|strong="H5782"\w*, my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*; \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w psaltery|strong="H5035"\w* and \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*: I \add myself\add* will \w awake|strong="H5782"\w* \w early|strong="H7837"\w*.
I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: I will \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* unto thee among the \w nations|strong="H3816"\w*.
For thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* unto the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* unto the \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w*.

Be thou \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, above the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*: \add let\add* thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \add be\add* above all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
